metadata.name: Loving Irrfan
metadata.description:
Created my genesis mint in the memory of the great actor Irrfan Khan.
Frame by frame animated NFT painting in the style of the much-renowned film - "Loving Vincent"

********************************************************************

Irrfan sadly passed away on this day in 2020 after suffering from a neuroendocrine tumour. I have decided to donate 20% of the fund raised to people suffering fatal diseases. Proof will be submitted on my Twitter profile.
